frontier spirit

i'm not joking when i say i played a LOT of oregon trail growing up. so I hope you'll take me seriously when I say Frontier Spirit was a hoot of project to work on. Located in Hocking Hills, Ohio, Frontier Spirit pays homage to the natives and pioneers of this greater appalachian area.

i won't sit here and bullshit you about colonization, but I will say, as a person whose family comes from it, the organizers of this event were nothing but sincere and respectful in their representations of life on the frontier. so thanks to them for upholding the history of it all, altho we all wish it could be different.

shot on canon 5D mkiii
